entries.title: Anya Taylor-Joy Triples Up on Summer Scarves
entries.content: Actor Anya Taylor-Joy is on board with the summer scarf dressing trend already enjoyed by Kylie Jenner and Alexa Chung—by wearing it three different ways.

entries.title: Why Machine Gun Kelly Says He Turned Down Auditioning for ‘Sinners’
entries.content: The rapper-singer claims he was supposed to audition for "the second vampire" in the Michael B. Jordan-led movie.
entries.normalized_title: why machine gun kelly says he turned down auditioning ‘sinners’

entries.title: Dua Lipa and fiancé Callum Turner get hot and heavy to celebrate singer’s Kosovo citizenship
entries.content: The "Levitating" singer was pictured sitting on the actor's lap after she received her citizenship to Kosovo.
entries.normalized_title: dua lipa fiancé callum turner get hot heavy celebrate singer’s kosovo citizenship
